meanings.definition: A thin, crisp Indian bread made from lentil flour.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating pappadams with my curry.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious pappadams with the meal.
meanings.sent3: When the pappadams arrived, they looked like crunchy circles.
meanings.sent4: The pappadams danced in the hot oil, turning golden and crispy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked pappadams filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Pappadams are typically served as an accompaniment to Indian meals.
meanings.sent1: My mom always includes pappadams in our Indian dinners.
meanings.sent2: The waiter brought a basket of pappadams to the table.
meanings.sent3: The pappadams whispered to the curry, 'We'll make your taste even better.'
meanings.sent4: The pappadams stood proudly next to the flavorful dishes.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the pappadams added excitement to the meal.

meanings.definition: To cook pappadams, they are usually fried or roasted until they puff up.
meanings.sent1: I watched as the chef fried the pappadams in hot oil.
meanings.sent2: She carefully roasted the pappadams over an open flame.
meanings.sent3: The pappadams giggled as they puffed up in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen filled with the delightful smell of cooking pappadams.
meanings.sent5: The pappadams swelled with pride as they expanded in the heat.
